_comment: Per-monster frame overrides. Key = sprite filename (without _NNNNN.png). Auto-extraction is skipped for monsters listed here.

_format.idle: [[sx, sy, sw, sh], ...] - frame rectangles from sprite sheet
_format.hurt: [[sx, sy, sw, sh], ...] - optional hurt frames (defaults to first idle frame)
_format.scale: float - override scale (default auto-calculated from frame height)
_format.row: int - which row to extract from (if using auto-extract with different row)
